member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Ethernet_J11D.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The mainboard socket that has the module plugged into it.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Ethernet_J11D.IsNetworkConnected
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether this ethernet module is physically connected to a network device.

remarks.para: This property enables you to determine if the module is physically connected to a network device, such as a router. When this property is true, it does not necessarily mean that the network connection is usable. You must also check the property. returns true if the network connection is both connected and configured for Internet Proctocol (IP) communication tasks.
remarks.note: When is true, it does not necessarily mean that the network connection is functional. The IP configuration for the network connection may be invalid for the network that it is connected to.
